chapters.title: Prologue:  Embers Falling on Dry Grass
chapters.info:
Ronaille Vevanios,
      p. 53â€”Aes Sedai of unknown Ajah.
      She was stilled by Rand
      during the battle at Dumai's Wells.  She has since been Healed by
      Damer Flinn.  She has been granted special
      privilege by the Wise Ones, and is free to come and go as she
      pleases.
